_header: Princess most excellent born of blood royal
Subjects: Worthies, Nine; pageant verses; occasional verse; Coventry, pageant at; Margaret, queen of England
_description: Ceremonial Verses (including the Nine Worthies) at the Coventry Pageant (1456) to welcome Queen Margaret — sixteen stanzas rhyme royal and three quatrains

CovLeet.First Lines:
Princes most excellent born of blode riallChoson quene of this
                    region conforte to all hus…
CovLeet.Last Lines:
…Calle on me boldly þerof I pray youAnd trist to me
                    feythefully I woll do þat may pay yow
CovLeet.Editions:
